title: OAuth2 SSO Resource Server Explained | Spring Boot Resource Server + Client (2025)
description:
In this tutorial, we build an oauth2 sso resource server using Spring Boot and Spring Security with the latest libraries (2025).
You‚Äôll learn how an oauth2 sso resource server communicates with an OAuth2 client, validates access tokens, and securely shares authentication information.

This video explains how the oauth2 sso resource server and OAuth2 client exchange JWT tokens and protected user data in a real-world setup.

By the end, you‚Äôll fully understand how to implement an OAuth2 SSO Resource Server in Spring Boot with proper token validation and secure communication.

title: OAuth2 SSO Client Application Tutorial | Spring Boot OAuth2 Login Explained (2025)
description:
In this tutorial, we build an OAuth2 SSO Client Application using Spring Boot and Spring Security with the latest libraries (2025).
You‚Äôll learn how an OAuth2 SSO Client Application connects to an Authorization Server, handles OAuth2 login, manages sessions, and securely authenticates users.

This video explains the complete OAuth2 SSO flow from the client application perspective, including redirect handling, token exchange, and secured endpoints.

By the end, you‚Äôll fully understand how to implement an OAuth2 SSO Client Application in a real-world Spring Boot project.

üî• What You‚Äôll Learn

What is OAuth2 Single Sign-On (SSO)
Client application vs Authorization Server
How OAuth2 login works internally
Configuring OAuth2 client in Spring Boot
Redirect URI & callback handling

title: Spring Boot OAuth2 Custom Login Page Tutorial | Custom Login Page with HTML, CSS, Thymeleaf
description:
In this tutorial, we build a Spring Boot OAuth2 Custom Login Page using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Thymeleaf.
This is the continuation of our OAuth2 series where we connect a Spring Boot OAuth2 Custom Login Page to our Authorization Server using Java 21, Spring Security 6, and database authentication.

You will learn how to design the UI, configure the login form, and integrate your Spring Boot OAuth2 Custom Login Page with JWT + Session authentication.

üî• What You Will Learn

Build a custom HTML/CSS login page
Integrate Thymeleaf login form with OAuth2
Connect login to database users
Configure JWT + Session authentication
Replace default Spring Security login screen

spring boot oauth2 custom login page
spring boot oauth2 custom login page tutorial
spring boot oauth2 custom login page thymeleaf

title: Local OAuth2.0 Authorization Server Tutorial (2025) | Java 21 + Spring Security + JWT + DB + Session
description:
Learn how to build a Local OAuth2.0 Authorization Server using Spring Security, Java 21, JWT, session authentication, and database connectivity ‚Äî all using the latest 2025 Spring Boot & Spring Authorization Server updates.

In this step-by-step tutorial, we set up:

‚úî Local OAuth2.0 Authorization Server
‚úî Custom Login Page (username + password)
‚úî Database-backed user authentication
‚úî MySQL/PostgreSQL integration
‚úî JWT access tokens + refresh tokens
‚úî Session-based login support
‚úî Client registration
‚úî Secure OAuth2 flows (Authorization Code, Token)
‚úî Modern Spring Security configurations (Java 21 compatible)

This tutorial uses:
‚Ä¢ Spring Boot 4.x
‚Ä¢ Spring Authorization Server (latest release)
‚Ä¢ Java 21
‚Ä¢ Spring Security 6+
‚Ä¢ MySQL/PostgreSQL
‚Ä¢ OAuth2 Client + Resource Server setup (optional) - upcoming videos

üî• What You‚Äôll Learn in This Video

‚úî How OAuth2.0 Authorization Server works
‚úî How to build an OAuth2.0 auth server locally
‚úî How to create custom login with Spring Security
‚úî How to store users in database (MySQL/PostgreSQL)
‚úî How JWT generation + validation works in OAuth2.0
‚úî How session authentication works
‚úî How to register OAuth2 clients
‚úî How to secure APIs using access tokens
‚úî How Spring Security 2025 authorization flows work

Whether you're a Java developer, Spring Boot learner, or backend engineer, this project gives you real-world authentication skills.
